Features

Home Features

Features that make us Stand Out

We provide simple solutions to complex problems

Over the air update for string changes

You can change any string of you app from Appscms, and those changes will be pushed to your user's mobile over the air !

Multi-locale content management system

Appscms natively supports multiple locales. You can add new locale or change value for any locale using Appcms and those changes will get reflected on your users mobile apps, without them needing to upgrade.
